name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: dTools - member list saver for Discord

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To export list of members that contains username, roles, activity, avatar, join date from Discord servers, and save as csv/xlsx

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost Your Discord Server Management with dTools – The Ultimate Member List Saver! 🚀

Are you tired of manually tracking each member in your Discord server? Say goodbye to the hassle! dTools is here to simplify your life. With just a few clicks, you can export a complete list of members from your Discord server, making your management tasks easier than ever.

🎯 Key Features
Effortlessly export member IDs and usernames.
Save member roles in a snap.
Download avatar pictures directly to your device.
Keep track of member activity seamlessly.
Capture and export member join times with ease.

🛠️ How to Get Started
Install the Extension: Add dTools to your Chrome browser.
Visit Any Discord Server: Open a new tab and go to your desired server.
Activate the Tool: Click the extension icon and then hit ‘GO’.
Download Your Data: Once the data loads, your CSV/XLSX file will download automatically. Prefer manual control? Simply click the button to save it.

📜 Terms of Use
For detailed terms, visit https://automatism.works/dtools/terms-of-use.html.

💬 Need Support?
We're here to help! Reach out anytime at automatismworks@gmail.com.

Make your Discord server management smarter and more efficient with dTools. Install now and start saving time today! 🌟
